content: this is a free fan-made amigurumi pattern to create your own eevee-inspired doll the finished amigurumi should measure approximately 10 inches tall in a sitting position size may vary depending on yarn type and personal yarn gauge you will want to use a 4 0mm hook or smaller colors seen in the photos are from big twist value yarn in camel and cream eyes are made from felts in black and white **other tools needed slicker brush** a slicker brush is used to create the fluffy fur around the neck
